title.line1: Share a piece of Real Japan

hero.description: Beautiful, authentic Japanese postcards mailed for you using real stamps. Send a thoughtful message from the Land of the Rising Sun to anyone in the world.

howItWorksSection.title: How it works
howItWorksSection.description: From our screen to their mailbox in four simple steps.

steps.title: Choose a postcard
steps.description: Pick a design from our curated collection of Japanese scenery and art.

steps.title: Recipient details
steps.description: Tell us who to send it to. We print the address clearly for reliable delivery.

steps.title: Your message
steps.description: Write a personal note. We'll transcribe it onto the card for you.

steps.title: We mail it
steps.description: Stamped with real Japanese stamps and mailed from Aichi Prefecture.

whyPhysicalSection.title: Why physical postcards?
whyPhysicalSection.description: A short note on why a real postcard still makes an impact in a digital world.
reasons: A real physical gesture in a digital world.
Real Japanese postage and cancellation marks.
Perfect for Japan lovers, collectors and special occasions.

faqSection.title: Frequently asked questions
faqSection.description: Answers to the most common questions.

items.question: Is the postcard sent directly to the recipient?
items.answer: Yes. You provide the recipient's address and we mail the postcard directly from Japan.

items.question: Can I send the postcard to myself?
items.answer: Yes. You can enter your own address and receive the postcard at home.

items.question: Is the address handwritten or printed?
items.answer: We print the address to ensure maximum legibility and reduce delivery errors.

items.question: Who writes the message?
items.answer: You can write your own message or choose to use one of our suggested texts.

items.question: Can I pick the exact postcard I’ll receive?
items.answer: You pick the collection — we take care of the rest. We’ll choose a beautiful postcard from that collection according to what’s available, so each order is a small, delightful surprise sent straight from Japan.

items.question: How long does delivery take?
items.answer: It depends on the destination country and postal services, but typically ranges from X to Y weeks.

items.question: Does the US$ 15 price include mailing?
items.answer: Yes. The price is per postcard, with mailing included.

finalCtaSection.title: Ready to send a postcard from Japan?
finalCtaSection.description: Choose a design, write your message and we will mail it from Aichi, Japan.
